name: Pixel Labs
description:
Create your own lab to supply clones so that your favorite Nintendo games can continue running.  Fulfill orders, upgrade capsules, and research new clones to expand your inventory.

Controls:

  • Left-click on objects to interact with them
  • WASD to move the camera
  • Mouse Wheel to zoom the camera in and out
  • Q & E to rotate the camera or objects being placed
  • ESC or Right Mouse click to cancel placement
  • ESC to open menu
